data.title: Why choose NetSuite
data.meta_description: Gartner has named NetSuite as the top cloud business solution that serves businesses of all sizes. NetSuite has more customers using cloud financials than any other solution. We configure it for UK charities and not for profits using decades of experience gained by our team.
data.text:
Built on the experience gained from tens of thousands of deployments worldwide amassed over two decades, NetSuite SuiteSuccess delivers an agile and staged pathway for our customers to succeed by engaging with them continuously throughout their lifecycle and keeping them on an upward growth trajectory.

Cloud Doing Good goes beyond simply providing Oracle NetSuite solutions. We are passionate about delivering a superior customer experience that helps you achieve your organisational goals, quickly and efficiently. From creating cost efficiencies through expert delivery from day one, to being on-site to mobilise your project and support your internal team, Cloud Doing Good will partner you throughout your NetSuite transformation.

With such a powerful tool as SuiteSuccess, one question we often get asked is "Where to start"?

For many, the answer is "Financials First". Financial Management and Finance are at the core of every business process. NetSuite’s integrated suite automate your finance and accounting functions enabling scaling of your organisation. This is often the best place to start, to realise benefits in days not months.

Rapid implementation gets you up and running quickly with pre-configured detailed workflows, functional roles, dashboards and KPIs – a strong, agile solution from which to scale.

Implementing a cloud-based planning and budgeting solution enables teams to spend more time understanding and analysing business trends and drivers of performance. Oracle NetSuite Planning and Budgeting enables organisations of all sizes to quickly adopt a world-class planning and budgeting application

This planning and budgeting solution includes flexible ‘what-if’ modelling capabilities, a powerful calculation engine which can accommodate a wide range of business logic with fast in-memory aggregation and instant analysis, along with robust reporting, and ad-hoc analysis with formatting and charting support.

Oracle NetSuite Planning and Budgeting is a product with a solid track record and impressive pedigree: originally based on Hyperion/Essbase Planning, a long-time market leader in enterprise performance management (EPM). SuiteSuccess Planning and Budgeting includes integration with NetSuite and features tools for operational expense planning, capital expense planning, personnel planning, revenue planning and financial statements, along with interactive dashboards and multi-currency support.

All of which deployable through the cloud, for rapid, low risk deployment.

Automate, streamline and increase project margins and profitability with the most advanced, 100% cloud-based PSA system.

Gain complete visibility into, and control over, the entire business in real time, from the moment a new opportunity is identified through to project delivery, invoicing and revenue recognition—all while eliminating double entry and costly systems and integration overhead.

Manage the complete Bid-to-Bill process of your services business with NetSuite’s leading Professional Services Automation solutions. Designed from the ground up to serve the needs of your growing services delivery business, our solutions are easy to implement, and simple to maintain. As your processes change, NetSuite’s powerful configurability and expanded capabilities in project management, resource management, project financials, billing and invoicing, are available when you need them.

Project Management capabilities enable project managers and team members to collaborate on projects and maintain current and accurate project status at all times, allowing managers to proactively identify and resolve potential issues with each engagement.

Resource Management enables project managers to optimise staffing and utilisation by minimising bench and ensuring that qualified resources are working on the right projects.

Project Accounting connects project activities with company financials, helps ensure accurate accounting and billing throughout the project lifecycle, and streamlines time and expense management while providing extensive reporting capabilities.

Billing and Invoicing Management automates one-off invoices as well as complex recurring, time and project-based billing. NetSuite provides flexible billing options—based on completing project work, achieving project milestones, or according to a schedule of dates.

One of the highest touchpoints in a PSA solution, our customisable timesheet feature enables users to quickly and easily capture detailed timesheets, whether in the office or on the road.

NetSuite Expense Management offers powerful features that improves productivity, enables better tracking and compliance, maximises accuracy and timeliness of expense reporting and enhances the overall user experience.

Fully featured, robust reporting and analytical tools deliver on-demand, real-time data, enabling you to monitor, report and analyse overall project performance in real-time.

How we do what we do

Software is never just about the product. It is about the implementation, user adoption and support.

As your partner, we will commit to support your organisation’s continuing transformation. Engaging at a strategic level, we will co-develop your road map to ensure that your NetSuite service continues to provide ROI.

At Cloud Doing Good, in addition to engaging at a strategic level, we adopt a "day in the life" of methodology, focusing with your end users prior to go live to ensure that change occurs with, not to, your teams.

As NetSuite experts, we are well placed to pragmatically handle user adoption and align strategic design thinking with execution. Our NetSuite Consulting services are centred to our clients needs and challenges.

Our Project Managers proactively work hand in hand with you from before you buy, through implementation and beyond, both onsite or remotely.

From the bench strength of Suite Success leading practices, we are well positioned to ensure that you have the optimal configuration to support your organisation’s processing, reporting and compliance needs.

All our Project Managers are ex-Oracle NetSuite employees, with the certifications and experience to make a difference.
